=========================
scdummyloc documentation
=========================

This is the documentation for the ``scdummyloc`` pick associator module for SeisComP.

Development
------------

The ``scdummyloc`` module is developed within the `VolcSAT`_ project, in order to 
improve volcanic events (lahars, mud flows or pyroclastic flows) detections from 
`Santiaguito volcano`_ at `INSIVUMEH`_.

License
-------

The ``scdummyloc`` module is free and open-source. Currently, it is
distributed under the `GNU Affero General Public License`_ (Free Software
Foundation, version 3 or later).
